CustomField.description: Used to run process and flow logic
CustomField.formula: OR( RecordType.Name = "BD BOXX CPQ", RecordType.Name = "BD AUS CPQ", RecordType.Name = "BD ES CPQ", RecordType.Name = "BD WFS CPQ", RecordType.Name = "BD MSS", RecordType.Name = "BD Modular", RecordType.Name = "BD MSS Major Projects", RecordType.Name = "BD Energy", RecordType.Name = "BD Workforce", RecordType.Name = "BD Lodging", RecordType.Name = "BD Disaster")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Record Types configured to use CPQ
CustomField.label: Is CPQ
